name: Theft
text: {Sacrifice}: Acquire a card of cost {2 gold} or less for free.

name: Heist
text: {Sacrifice}: The next time you acquire a card this turn, you may acquire another card of the same faction and of equal or lesser cost for free.{Sacrifice}: This turn, you may acquire a card of cost {1 gold} or more from an opponent’s discard pile by paying its cost. You may not use this ability on your first or second turn.

name: Timely Heist
text: {Sacrifice}: The next time you acquire a card this turn, you may acquire another card of the same faction and of equal or lesser cost for free. If the second card costs {3 gold} or less, put it into your hand.

name: Skillful Heist
text: {Sacrifice}: The next time you acquire a card this turn you may acquire another card of equal or lesser cost for free.{Sacrifice}: This turn, you may acquire a card of cost {1 gold} or more from an opponent’s discard pile by paying its cost. You may also acquire a card from the market row of cost {3 gold} or less for free. You may not use this ability on your first or second turn.

name: Practiced Heist
text: {Sacrifice}: The next time you acquire a card this turn you may acquire another card of the same faction and of equal or lesser cost for free. Put the second card into your hand.

name: Smooth Heist
text: {Sacrifice}: The next time you acquire a card this turn you may acquire another card of equal or lesser cost for free. Put cards of cost {3 gold} or less acquired in this way into your hand.

name: Masterful Heist
text: {Sacrifice}: This turn, you may acquire a card of cost {1 gold} or more from an opponent’s discard pile by paying its cost. You may also acquire a card from the market row of cost {5 gold} or less for free. You may not use this ability on your first or second turn.{Sacrifice}: The next time you acquire a card this turn you may acquire another card that costs up to {1 gold} more for free.

name: Pickpocket
text: {Expand and pay 2 gold}: If you can target the master, gain {3 health} and look at the top card of their deck. You may put it into the master’s discard pile (or back on top of their deck).{Expand and pay 2 gold}: {Gain 3 health}Target opponent discards a card.

name: Sleight of Hand
